short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to hide Like buttons, reaction counters, and comment reactions on Facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides Facebook likes and reactions, promoting a healthier, less distracting experience.

Focus on your Facebook experience, not the numbers.
Remove social pressure from Facebook for a healthier feed.
Reclaim your social media experience by hiding Likes and Reactions.
Create and connect on Facebook without the distraction of Likes and Reactions.
Use the easy toggle to turn on/off the feature.

If you think this is useful, you can buy my wife a coffee here:
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/leonidr
